entry.title: University Blogs Relaunched
entry.summary: Welcome to the relaunched Blogs.udmercy.edu. Our blog platform has been upgraded from the previous Roller blog system to WordPressMU. Why? entry.content:
Welcome to the relaunched Blogs.udmercy.edu.

Our blog platform has been upgraded from the previous Roller blog system to WordPressMU.  Why?  WordPressMU offers you more features, a cleaner and simpler user interface and if you have used WordPress previously there is no learning curve.

We are still working to improve the experience but feel free to login and give it a try.  You may login using the same credentials you use to login to the TitanConnect portal.
